 =
     
      Hi,

I have a site that allows my crawler to be least polite. T=
he site is huge and also capable of handling large traffic. 
I increased th=
e number of parallel queues from 1 to 10, but no visible improvement in cra=
wl speed - still around 0.28 docs/sec against 0.19 docs/sec with 1 queue. 
=

I have set the heapSize to 2GB and at no point of time more than 1G was be=
ing used.
I have also loosened all the other politeness factors.
If not 10 =
times, the crawl should have been faster by at least 5 times with 10 queues=
. 
Any clues?

Thanks,
Pranay



      

    
     

    
    


 



  


=
